data.title: Skiers vs Snowboarders 1985
data.question: Snow surfin is only practiced
choices: in California for almost two years
in United States for almost ten years
data.answer: in United States for almost ten years
data.transcription: an idea that originated in where else : California. It's been around for almost a decade in United State. And now it's becoming the trendy thing to do on our local ski slopes

data.question: The operators ...
choices: accept only skiers and good snowboarders
don' t want any snowboards onto the chairlift
data.answer: don' t want any snowboards onto the chairlift
data.transcription: The operators refuse anyone with a snowboard onto the charlift

data.question: The major problem with the snowboards is..
data.transcription: The major problem with the snowboards is that they run into people, they can't see behind them.

data.question: with the powder strap..
choices: your board can't go anymore than three feet
it helps to keep stable on your board
your feet are well tied to the board
data.answer: your board can't go anymore than three feet
data.transcription: this powder strap right here hold you on like a break, your board can't go anymore than three feet

data.question: Ski patrols hope that in the future ...
choices: skis and snowboards will find compromise
they won't see snowboarders at all
data.answer: they won't see snowboarders at all
data.transcription: Presenter:you see any compromise in the future at all. Ski patrol: no no, skiing is becoming more and more popular.. We don't want them at all
